4.label: Relay State On Power (switch Endpoint Only)

7.label: Heating Tpi Cycle
7.description: Value 1 = 3 cycles per hour, 2 = 6 cycles per hour, 3 = 9 cycles per hour and 4 = 12 cycles per hour

metadata.inclusion:
1. Put network controller in Inclusion mode.
2. Hold the button on the top of the Beanbag Receiver for more than 2 seconds until the Network Indicator LED turns red then release the button to put the Beanbag Receiver into Learn Mode. 
3. Beanbag Receiver will indicate success with sold white Network LED
metadata.exclusion:
1. Put network controller in Exclusion mode.
2. Hold the button on the top of the Beanbag Receiver for more than 2 seconds until the Network Indicator LED turns red then release the button to put the Beanbag Receiver into Learn Mode. 
3. Beanbag Receiver will indicate success with flashing white Network LED (3Sec ON and 30Sec OFF)
metadata.reset:
Long press the bottom button (located underside the unit) for around 4 Sec until the Network indicator LED turns red then release the button.

This function should only be used in case of primary controller is missing or inoperable
